snippet: In “Fairy Tales From the Brothers Grimm,” the British children’s author Philip Pullman retells 50 stories, including “Cinderella” and “Little Red Riding Hood.”
abstract: Amanda Katz reviews book Fairy Tales From the Brothers Grimm: A New English Version by Philip Pullman.
lead_paragraph: In “Fairy Tales From the Brothers Grimm,” the British children’s author Philip Pullman retells 50 stories, including “Cinderella” and “Little Red Riding Hood.”

headline.seo: ‘Fairy Tales From the Brothers Grimm,’ by Philip Pullman
headline.main: The Grimms’ Catalog, Revisited and Told Anew
headline.print_headline: The Grimms’ Catalog, Revisited and Told Anew
